summary: 15 AMP CIRCUIT CONTROLLING STOP LIGHTS, TURN SIGNAL, HORN, CRUISE CONTROL WILL FAIL INTERMITTENTLY. CHECKED FUSE AND IS OK. RETURNED TO DEALER TWICE UNDER WARRANTY AND ONCE OUT OF WARRANTY FOR CIRCUIT REPAIRS. PROBLEM FIXED ONLY FOR SHORT PERIOD BUT REAPPEARS. CIRCUIT PROBLEM MAY NOT APPEAR AT TIME OF DEALER REPAIR AS PROBLEM IS INTERMITTENT. CIRCUIT PROBLEM OCCURS WHEN RIDING MOTORCYCLE AND MAY CORRECT ITSELF SEVERAL TIMES. CIRCUIT PROBLEM OCCURRED DURING 2 YEARS OF WARRANTY, 1 AGAIN ABOUT 1.5 YEARS AGO AND LAST WEEKEND JUNE 17, 2017
